footer.description: Join thousands of creators who are rapidly building the future of Solana-based memecoins. Whether you’re launching your first token or expanding your project, our platform provides all the tools you need to design, customize, and launch a professional website for your Solana memecoin—quickly and with ease.

hero.title: No code, no hassle, just moonlight magic
hero.description: Forget the boring details. Choose a wild template, brand it with your coin’s name, and get ready to soar.

launch.title: Kickstart Your Solana Journey Effortlessly
launch.description: Build dynamic, customizable platforms for your Solana projects—no coding required. Elevate your presence in the fast-paced blockchain ecosystem.

features.title: All the Tools You Need
features.description: Build a unique website to showcase your memecoin project, packed with advanced features

template.title: Innovative Templates
template.description: Explore a range of sleek, responsive designs crafted specifically for memecoin projects. Each template is fine-tuned for maximum impact and user engagement.

editing.title: Effortless Editing
editing.description: Personalize your website with ease using our intuitive editor. Modify colors, text, and layouts effortlessly—no technical skills needed

updates.title: Instant Updates
updates.description: View your edits in real-time as you make them. Refine every detail to perfection before launching your site to the community.

FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQs.description: Your Essential Guide to Common Questions

questions.question: What is AURORA?
questions.answer: AURORA is a platform that enables you to quickly create professional websites for your meme token. Just select a template, personalize it with your token’s details, and download your website files instantly.

questions.question: How does AURORA work?
questions.answer: AURORA streamlines the creation of your meme token’s website. Select a template, customize it with your token information, and instantly receive the website files ready for download—no technical skills needed

questions.question: Do we host your website?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide full hosting for your website. Once you’ve created and customized your site using our templates, we take care of the hosting process, ensuring that your website is securely stored and available online. Our hosting is reliable, fast, and optimized for performance, so your website runs smoothly at all times, with no additional setup required from you.

questions.question: Is website hosting included?
questions.answer: Each template is designed with essential features for your memecoin, including token details, buy buttons, tokenomics, roadmap, team profiles, FAQ section, and social media links. All templates are mobile-friendly and optimized for top performance

questions.question: How much does it cost?
questions.answer: We offer two pricing plans: the Standard option for 0.045 SOL per website, and the Premium option for 0.25 SOL, which includes access to exclusive templates and advanced features. Select the plan that works best for your requirements.

classic.label: Classic
classic.description: This template is created not just for the presentation of memecoin, but to turn a visit to the site into a memorable experience. From the first seconds the user enters a bright, dynamic world where everything speaks of creativity, boldness and lightness of the project. The visual component of the template as if shouts: "Here begins the story, which is worth remembering!"
classic.shortDescription: This template is created not just for the presentation of memecoin, but to turn a visit to the site into a memorable experience

simple.label: Simple
simple.description: This template is the epitome of simplicity and convenience, created especially for those who want to quickly and easily present their memecoin. It allows you to focus on the main thing without distracting users with unnecessary details. With this template, you don't need to understand complex technical details or spend hours on customization. Just fill in the fields, upload the necessary images - and your site is ready!
simple.shortDescription: This template is the epitome of simplicity and convenience, created especially for those who want to quickly and easily present their memecoin.

impressive.label: Impressive
impressive.description: This template is the perfect choice for creating your memcoin website that will attract attention and become a memorable event in the crypto world. User-friendly, colorful and functional, it makes it easy to present your project to a wide audience. The template is designed with ease of use and stylish design in mind, so that even beginners can launch their site in a few minutes. Its design emphasizes the lightness and humor characteristic of memcoins, creating a unique atmosphere and allowing you to stand out among other projects.
impressive.shortDescription: This template is the perfect choice for creating your memecoin website that will attract attention and become a memorable event in the crypto world.

rocket.label: Rocket
rocket.description: Rocket template is a bright, dynamic and memorable choice for your memecoin website. Its main feature is a stylish rocket animation, which creates a sense of movement and growth, symbolizing the rapid development of your project. This template is perfect for those who want to show the ambitiousness of their memcoin and attract users' attention with a unique presentation.
rocket.shortDescription: Rocket template is a bright, dynamic and memorable choice for your memecoin website.

standard.label: Standard
standard.description: For 0.045 Solana you can create a website using Classic and Simple template. These are simple templates, with a clear and pleasant user interface. They are easy to edit and modify.

advanced.label: Advanced
advanced.description: For 0.05 sol you can use the Impressive template. This template is full of different elements that you can edit to fit your memtoken. This template has blocks such as "How to buy", "FAQ", "Roadmap".

professional.label: Professional
professional.description: For 0.065 Sol you will get a fully professional template Rocket with animations, different blocks, buttons, full editing for your memecoin.

changeDomain.title: Change domain
changeDomain.description: Enter a valid subdomain (2-20 characters) using letters, numbers, and hyphens. No spaces or special characters allowed.

delete.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your website data from our servers.

items.title: Dashboard page
list: On the home page, you can write your site name and click the "Start Building" button
Decorate your page the way you want.
After successful payment, congratulations, you have successfully created your website!

list: Decorate your page the way you want.
After successful payment, congratulations, you have successfully created your website!

contacts.message: If you have any problems, errors with transactions, a suggestion to improve our site, or want to ask something, feel free to contact us, we will be happy to help you:
